translations: 连载；（英）写成连载长篇而刊登（等于 serialization）

sentences.sentence: When the end of the buffer is reached, some serialisation takes place that reduces the rate of data transfer to disk.
sentences.translation: 达到缓冲区尾部后，需要进行某种序列化操作，以降低数据传输到磁盘的速率。

sentences.sentence: While the BBC serialisation of The Secret Garden was showing on t.v. the book was never on any of the shelves of libraries across the nation.
sentences.translation: 当英国广播电视台播出连续剧《秘密花园》时，英国上下的图书馆里该书被借阅一空。

sentences.sentence: The 2010 projects include expanded solutions for shop floor equipment to ERP, an automated tag serialisation and VIN generator and mobile applications.
sentences.translation: 2010年的项目包括ERP系统，自动标记串行和VIN发电机和移动应用扩大了车间内的设备的解决方案。
